content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to Google "Clockify time tracking software features" and received a list of links. The links included features such as time tracking, project management, invoicing, and team management. I learned that Clockify offers various features for boosting productivity, billing clients, managing teams, and streamlining processes.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://clockify.me/feature-list", "question": "What are the features of the Clockify time tracking software?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the features of the Clockify time tracking software, which includes timekeeping, reporting, management, scheduling, and integration capabilities. The software allows users to track time using a timer or manually, log weekly activities, track GPS location, and record expenses. It also offers features for team communication and collaboration, project and task management, and time off tracking. The software is available for desktop and mobile devices and offers integrations with other apps. It is free to use with unlimited users and offers 24/7 support.\n\nLinks: [' (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nClockify\\nTime and cost tracking\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPlaky\\nProject and task management\\n\\n\\n (https://plaky.com/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPumble\\nTeam communication and collaboration\\n\\n\\n (https://pumble.com/)', ' (https://cake.com/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
